categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Anaakin Solo was a clone of the Human Jedi Knight Anakin Solo. He was cloned by Grand Admiral Thrawn. He replaced Anakin with Anaakin at some point.
Anaakin Solo was mentioned in "An Apology", a short story by Timothy Zahn that was released on April 1, 2012 as an April Fool's Day joke.
